author: vors
body:
New schema supports different source-sets per framework / configuration
http://json.schemastore.org/project-1.0.0-rc2

We should revert these changes and take care about preserving original encoding.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @vors I can do this pretty easily, I have the Git commands to identify and revert these changes on stand-by.

title: Replace `#if !CORECLR` guards for the whole files by `exclude` in project.json
